occupation: Vice-President, Technology, Emerging Tech & Sustainability at Tata Consultancy Services
headline: Tech Leader I AI/ML, 5G, Quantum, Cloud I Keynote Speaker l Board Member I Proponent of AI & Tech for good —Social Impact, Sustainability & Mental Health I People Connector I Eternal Optimist I Forever Student!
summary:
With over three decades of experience in the technology sector, I am a versatile leader who combines knowledge of AI/ML, 5G, mobile networks, and IT services with strategic vision and strong customer focus to solve business problems. I have a passion for using technology for social impact, especially in the areas of equity, mental health, and sustainability.

As the VP of Sustainability and Emerging Tech at TCS, I lead the market development and delivery of innovative solutions for the broader North American market, working with a wide range of industries as well as VC and PE-backed growth firms. 

Throughout my career, I have held a wide variety of senior roles in global business development, product development, engineering, product management, sales leadership, partnerships, and alliances at TCS, Nortel, Bell, and Tata Group, and have also successfully launched and scaled new products and services across the globe. 

I bring a unique blend of strategic leadership, cutting-edge innovation, and a deep commitment to social and environmental responsibility in the technology sector. My career spans a diverse range of roles (from product engineering to sales and business development) within the telecom, wireless networking, semiconductors, and IT industries, each contributing to my comprehensive understanding of the technological landscape. 

Top 5 Attributes:

Strategic Leadership
Innovative problem solving
Cultivating global-winning teams
Extensive CXO-level trusted relationships
Entrepreneurial drive

I have also contributed to the advancement of technology research in ML, reverse engineering, software management, and AI for good by publishing papers, delivering guest lectures, and mentoring students and professionals.

I serve on the boards of two companies and two non-profits, while also being an advisor to a few startups that are developing AI-based technology for global impact.

In a world where technology shapes our future, I am committed to leading with empathy and innovation, championing sustainable solutions, and creating a positive impact in both business and society.

experiences.title: Vice President, Technology
experiences.description:
Technology is changing every aspect of business today -  business models, paradigms, and the way products and solutions are developed and marketed. With the advent of AI, Cloud, Analytics, Mobile and IOT, technology businesses in the field of Semi-conductors, Networking technology and Devices are in the forefront of creating this new world. The Technology Business Unit at TCS aims to help these businesses achieve their goals by providing smart, intelligent, automated and cost-effective solutions and services that create a competitive advantage and drive significant upstream value.

My role is to drive tech solutions and key customer engagements in this space by leveraging my experience in AI, Telecom, IT and Mobility to help TCS strengthen its leadership position while enabling clients achieve to their goals.

experiences.title: Vice-President, Tata Group Business
experiences.description:
The Tata Group is a diversified global conglomerate known for its social responsibility and long list of philanthropic activities. With revenues topping $100 Billion, the group consists of over 100+ companies operating in seven major industries and 80 countries.

TCS is a part of the Tata group and a global leader in Information Technology services.

This senior leadership role, reporting to the CEO of TCS, is to bring the entire breadth of TCS's technology and business experience to build thought leadership, develop innovative solutions and drive business benefits for the Tata group companies.

experiences.title: Vice-President, Global Business Development
experiences.description: Responsible for creating and growing business with top strategic global customers and driving significant new business opportunities in Telecom and Networking space.

Facilitate developing and implementing short-term and long-term strategic planning.

Key focus: Drive localization of Nortel products in Asia (Asia-Pacific + Greater China). Develop/build local PLM organization in Asia. Drive incr. Enterprise revenue in key markets across Asia using custom development and new products in Asia. Full P&L responsibility with a mandate to deliver quick, unique, cost-effective, and differentiated Enterprise products to meet the Asia requirements.

experiences.title: Director, Wireless Solutions, Asia
experiences.description:
Responsible for successfully developing and supporting wireless business in South East Asia and Indian subcontinent for Nortel. During this time, successfully delivered significant wireless business for Nortel in Asia.
•	Grew India Carrier/Service-provider business from 0 in 2003 to 500M+ in 2004-05. 
•	Broke-in to several major flagship accounts in India/ASEAN in Wireless business resulting in multi-million $ contracts with new customers.
•	Winner of Circle of Excellence award & Special Achievers award for outstanding support & leadership to sales teams in helping them win significant business in India and ASEAN.

accomplishment_publications.name: Wonder Women in Business Ally, Malur Narayan

accomplishment_publications.description: In this episode of 'Growth Mindset Conversations', I am talking to Malur Narayan , a senior leader in TCS USA.  He talks about how pandemic is affecting careers and leadership. Malur Narayan has shared his journey in the book 'Get Your Next Promotion' in Chapter no, 8 on 'Creating Visibility and Personal Branding'. You can find the amazon link to the book on channel's cover page.

recommendations:
Manoj Hingorani



Malur is an excellent people manager with a gifted combination of hands-on and hands-off management to drive the best results from his team. He exhibits genuine care and concern for his team members and consistently inspires and motivates them to do their best.

Malur is also a master at building and nurturing senior executive and C-level relationships and his excellent network of contacts makes him a valuable asset across multiple industry verticals.

Malur's unique and creative solutions make even the most complex problems seem easy to solve.

I wish him the best in all his endeavours.

Douglas Reid



Malur is a compelling presenter.  He has full mastery of his brief; handles questions in a constructive and thorough manner; and is able to distill complex strategies to their essence.  On more than one occasion his skill at presenting and explaining ideas has stimulated interest in TCS and the Tata Group as a whole.  I'd rely on him without hesitation in situations where persuasion is necessary, rooted firmly in fact and elaborated business judgment.
